# Tables {#sec-tables}
 
```{r}
#| tbl-cap: Landings over time for example data by fleet. Subset for only 10 years.
#| echo: false
exdat <- readRDS("~/GitHub/a11y-sandbox/asar-all-elements/report/exdat.rds")
library(gt)
library(kableExtra)
# filter data for landings
landings <- exdat |>
  dplyr::filter(
    grepl("landings_observed", label),
    year > 2010,
    # year < 2026,
    !is.na(estimate)
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(year, fleet, estimate) |>
  tidyr::pivot_wider(
    names_from = fleet,
    values_from = estimate
  )
# gt(landings)
kable(landings)
```
